message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.MM

This paper is about designing a recommendation system for socially curated image collections. The paper discusses image collection modeling and similarity measurement, which are key issues in information retrieval (IR) and computer vision (CV). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also employs a metric learner, which is a machine learning (ML) technique, and considers image collection recommendation as a dynamic similarity measurement problem, which involves online learning and user modeling. Therefore, cs.SI and cs.LG are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed methods on a large scale Pinterest data set, which is a multimedia (MM) data set. Therefore, cs.MM is also a likely sub-category.
